features: Telegram Integration, Privacy-Focused, AI-Generated Custom Media (Photos/Videos), Personalized Voice Notes, Live Voice Calls, Smart Memory, Character-Driven Dick Battle Arena, Diverse AI Personalities (Scarlett, Isabella, etc.), Multiple Languages, Ad-Free Experience
description: Telegram-based AI companion bot offering private, secure conversations with personalized AI characters. Features encrypted chats, AI-generated custom media (photos/videos), personalized voice notes, live voice calls for real-time conversations, and character-driven Dick Battle Arena where each AI personality (like Scarlett the CEO or Isabella the chef) provides unique reactions and commentary. Complete multimedia experience within Telegram's encrypted messaging platform.
tagline: Telegram-based AI companion bot with private, encrypted conversations
short_description: Telegram AI companion bot with AI-generated media, voice notes, live calls, and character-driven personalities
key_features: Telegram Integration, AI-Generated Photos/Videos, Voice Notes, Live Voice Calls, Character Personalities, Dick Battle Arena, Encrypted Chats, Smart Memory
